featured.text: A Maasai warrior is rarely seen without his spear and shield.
For instance, a ventilated hard hat was developed to keep wearers cooler, and see-through face shields were attached to better see the hazards lurking above.
In what order did the following protective hats appear? a. fiberglass hats b. hats with see-through shields c. hats with canvas and leather d. hats with tar over them (A)

definition.en_def: A broad piece of metal or other material used as a protective barrier.
definition.example: The knight raised his shield to block the incoming arrows.
